rundhE vaiSvadEqvIM ba#hurUqpAmA la#BEqtAnna#kAmO vaiSvadEqvaM ~MvA annaqM ~MviSvA#nEqva dEqvAnth svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq ta EqvAsmAq annaqM  praya#cCantyannAqda Eqva Ba#vatiq Canda#sAqM ~MvA EqSha rasOq yadvaqSA rasa# ivaq Kaluq vA annaqM Canda#sAmEqva rasE#naq rasaqmannaqmava# rundhE vaiSvadEqvIM 
ba#hurUqpAmA la#BEtaq grAma#kAmO vaiSvadEqvA vai - [  ]  45
